channel.title: Forgotten password for the workstation, pls help
channel.description:
Hi people, I didn't use the workstation for awhile so I forgot both the root and user passwords. They are not changeme since I changed them. Is there a way to recover them because I have an text document in the wokstation which I need?
Will be very glad if someone can help.
Best regards.

item.title: Forgotten password for the workstation, pls help
item.dc:creator: Starko
item.description:
Ooo, Ego, thanks man, it worked now for the user when I typed passwd user!

Read full topic
item.source: Forgotten password for the workstation, pls help

item.title: Forgotten password for the workstation, pls help
item.dc:creator: Starko
item.description:
I’ve just tried this https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Hrm3_CFKic but it doesn’t work. It said that the password is changed but when I try to login it doesn’t work.

Will check the link. Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Forgotten password for the workstation, pls help

item.title: Forgotten password for the workstation, pls help
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Starko:

Is there a way to recover them because I have an text document in the wokstation which I need?

Well nothing easy, maybe this could work: https://pve.proxmox.com/wiki/Debian_reset_root_password Also, please keep in mind that this isn’t a Whonix centered question, but rather something general to Debian.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
